result.reason: Window focus/foreground issue on Intel HD 520 may be driver-specific or already resolved in newer .NET 10 runtime; need repro steps, OS version, and confirmation on current build.
result.approach: Verify if still reproducible on .NET 10; if confirmed, check SetForegroundWindow/BringToFront calls in FrmMain startup sequence and add WS_EX_NOACTIVATE workaround guard for affected GPU drivers.
